listData.name: Goldrate Home Loan
listData.description: Our low rate home loan comes with a great range of features to help you pay off your home sooner.

features.additionalInfo: Available for the ACT Land Rent Scheme
Not Available for Fixed Loans or Interest Only
No Monthly Account Keeping Fees
Up to $5,000 over a Fixed Term period
Fee Free redraw

fees.name: Substituting Securities fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when you substitute an existing property with a new property as security for your home loan.

fees.name: Dishonoured Cheque fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when a cheque or other payment to your account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Substituting of Security Legal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when you substitute an existing property with a new property as security for your home loan.

fees.name: Monthly Product Split Fee
fees.additionalValue: $7 per additional product per month during the period of the split, debited to the account for the other product each month.

fees.name: Consent to Subdivision Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask for our consent to register a subdivision or other plan or dealing.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to prepare a discharge of mortgage. Note: This fee does not include registration costs for the land titles office

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged where the whole or any part of your loan repayment remains unpaid after 14 days past the due date. Applies to all Police Bank loans and continuing credit accounts

fees.name: Second Mortgage Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage

fees.name: Future Legal Costs and Disbursements Relating to any Variations, Dealings, Discharges
Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a default notice under a loan contract when an arrears remains unremedied after we have sent you an arrears letter.

fees.name: Production of Title Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to our solicitors when you ask us to produce the certificate of title of your property to enable registration of a plan or any document dealing with your property

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request an additional statement

fees.name: General Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask for our consent to any matter relating to a loan contract or security (other than a matter for which a separate fee is payable).

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you an arrears letter asking you to remedy an arrears under a loan contract.

fees.name: Third Party Costs
fees.additionalInfo:
Any other costs charged to us by a third party will be passed on to you. Some examples are as follows:
• Title Change Fee
• Land and Property Information Search Fees
• Land and Property Information Registration Fees

fees.name: RTGS Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to transfer settlement funds to an agent on behalf of our Solicitor.

fees.name: Issue of Statutory Default Notice Legal Fees
Mortgage Loan Top up/Increase in Credit Limit Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable on application or funding. Applies to all Home Loan Applications

fees.name: Early Repayment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Early Repayment Fee payable, if, during any fixed rate period, you:
(a)	repay the whole of your unpaid balance (full early repayment);
(b)	pay $5000 or more in repayments above the contractual repayments (partial early repayment); or
(c)	become obliged to repay the whole loan after you have defaulted (full early repayment)

and the fixed rate that applied to the loan is more than the prevailing market interest rate at the time of the early repayment, as determined by us in our absolute discretion.

listData.name: First Home Loan
listData.description: We’re proudly supporting the Government’s initiative to help Australians purchase their first home sooner. Border Bank will help you get into your first home with our low rates and great features.

features.additionalInfo: Fee Free redraw
Up to $5,000 over the Fixed Term period
Not Available for Fixed Loans or Interest Only

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be eligible for the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme

listData.name: Customs Value Home Loan
listData.description: Helping Border Officers with a low rate home loan that has a great range of features to help pay off your home sooner.

features.additionalInfo: Fee Free redraw
Not Available for Fixed Loans or Interest Only
Available for ACT Land Rent Scheme
Up to $5,000 over the Fixed Term period

eligibility.additionalInfo: Border Value Home Loan only available to current serving Border Officers or a Retired Border Officer(s) who are a member of a Union that is associated with the Border Federation of Australia. This includes NSW Border Association (including Associate members), and the Australian Federal Border Association.

detailData.name: Customs Value Home Loan
detailData.description: Helping Border Officers with a low rate home loan that has a great range of features to help pay off your home sooner.

listData.name: Term Deposit
listData.description: Bank of Border Bank Investment Accounts are designed to make your money work as hard for you as you worked to get it. With terms of 3, 4, 5,  6, 7, 9, 12, 36, 48 and 60 months – interest paid at maturity, 6 months or every month – a Border Bank Term Deposit is as flexible as you require it to be.

features.additionalInfo: You can check your account details using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
Simply maintain a combined monthly balance of $5000 or more worth of savings, investments or loans and you will receive more fee free ATM and EFTPOS transactions as well as qualify for fee rebates.
You can check your account details using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
Resist temptation to dip into funds by locking funds away

depositRates.additionalInfo: Balance $10,000 or more - I10 Interest Paid Every Month
Balance $20,000 or more - I60 Interest Paid at Maturity
Balance $10,000 or more - I25 Interest Paid at Maturity

detailData.name: Term Deposit
detailData.description: Bank of Border Bank Investment Accounts are designed to make your money work as hard for you as you worked to get it. With terms of 3, 4, 5,  6, 7, 9, 12, 36, 48 and 60 months – interest paid at maturity, 6 months or every month – a Border Bank Term Deposit is as flexible as you require it to be.

listData.name: Savings Plus Account
listData.description: This high interest rate savings account helps you to earn more on your money. You can manage this account through internet & mobile banking and our app, however you can't access to your funds via a VISA debit card.

features.additionalInfo: Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.
A facility to make direct debit payments from your account
Simply maintain a combined monthly balance of $5000 or more worth of savings, investments or loans and you will receive more fee free ATM and EFTPOS transactions as well as qualify for fee rebates.
You can check your account details or make transfers anytime or anywhere using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
Account allows Periodical Payments via Cheque and can also make External Periodical Payments
You can check your account details or make transfers anytime or anywhere using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.

fees.name: Dormant Accounts fee
fees.additionalInfo:
After 3 years an account is classed as dormant if no Member transactions occur. Interest, fees
and government charges are not classed as transactions.

fees.name: Third Party Costs
fees.additionalInfo:
Any costs charged to us from a third party will be passed on to you. Information on these costs is
available on request.

fees.name: Counter Cash withdrawal fee up to $24,999
fees.additionalValue: First 3 free if part of Reduced Fees program

fees.name: Overdrawn Savings Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable when any Savings Account is overdrawn by $75 or more within a calendar month
Interest will also be charged at the then current Overdraft interest rate

fees.name: External Electronic Periodical Payments
fees.additionalValue: If part of the Reduced Fees program, the first 3 transactions are free
fees.additionalInfo: Per transaction if Border Bank staff set up on your behalf.

fees.name: Special Cheque clearance fee for Personal Accounts
Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee per transaction

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable if and when we send you a default notice for an overdrawn account where an arrears remains
unremedied after we have sent you an arrears letter

fees.name: Document Retrieval fee
fees.additionalValue: Minimum $22.77 per hour retrieval fee and minimum $30 per hour administrative fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on request for documents to be retrieved

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if and when you request an additional statement.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Balance $0 to $49,999

lendingRates.additionalInfo: May be applicable if your account becomes overdrawn

detailData.name: Savings Plus Account
detailData.description: This high interest rate savings account helps you to earn more on your money. You can manage this account through internet & mobile banking and our app, however you can't access to your funds via a VISA debit card.

listData.name: Mortgage Offset Account
listData.description: This savings account helps reduce the interest you pay on your mortgage. Funds are available at call. You can set up bill payments and use internet and phone banking on this account.

features.additionalInfo: You can pay bills via BPAY and check your account details or make transfers anytime or anywhere using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
Account allows Periodical Payments via Cheque and can also make External Periodical Payments
Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.
Simply maintain a combined monthly balance of $5000 or more worth of savings, investments or loans and you will receive more fee free ATM and EFTPOS transactions as well as qualify for fee rebates.

BPAY - for your bill payments with access to the
BPAY system*
Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.
You can pay bills via BPAY and check your account details or make transfers anytime or anywhere using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
A facility to make direct debit payments from your account
Make regular credits like your pay into this account

listData.name: Easy Access Transaction Account
listData.description: Your day to day savings account for all your basic banking needs. Your funds are at call and earn daily interest. You can access your money by card or cheque, set up bill payments and use internet or phone banking.

features.additionalInfo:
BPAY - for your bill payments with access to the
BPAY system*
Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.
Simply maintain a combined monthly balance of $5000 or more worth of savings, investments or loans and you will receive more fee free ATM and EFTPOS transactions as well as qualify for fee rebates.
All Members receive 4 RediATM transactions and are therefore charged 1.37 per transaction. 4 without Reduced Fees Program
A Border Bank Easy Access Account offers all the features you could ask from an everyday access facility
up to $1000
Withdraw cash at any participating Australia Post outlets with Bank@POST™

Verified by Visa is a service designed to ensure you are protected while shopping online with your Visa card. As you make a purchase online, Border Bank assesses the risk of the transaction based on a number of factors. In some instances, you may be asked to confirm some personal details (date of birth, mother's maiden name, address details) so Border Bank can be sure the card isn't being used without your permission.
Pay with your Border Bank Visa Debit Cards using Apple Pay
Set regular payments like your pay sent straight to your account
Our Debit Card is issued with the Visa PayWave ‘contactless’ payment feature. This allows you to pay for purchases under $100 without swiping, signing, or entering a PIN at participating merchants.
In addition 4 other Financial Institution ATM withdrawal fees are rebated, max $8 a month if on Reduced Fees program. 10 free RediATM transactions if on Reduced Fees program
Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.

Our Visa Card provides access to the Visa Entertainment program. This gives you the opportunity to purchase unique deals including preferred seating at special events, discounts on retail as well as other exclusive offers
Adding flexibility to your account, Credit Overdraft. Attaching a Credit Overdraft facility to this account means you will always be prepared for those unexpected bills or bargain buys!

fees.name: Coin Handling Fee
fees.additionalValue: Fee can also be 2 % of the amount whichever is the greater. Payable whenever coins deposited in a single month reach an accumulated value in excess of $100

fees.name: Bank@Post Cash Withdrawal fee
fees.additionalValue: Includes; cash withdrawals, declined Bank@Post transactions including incorrect PIN entered, insufficient funds and exceeding withdrawal limits

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalValue: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee per transaction

fees.name: Visa International Fees
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable if and when you use the Visa Card overseas and the transaction is in a
foreign currency. All overseas transactions are converted to Australian dollars
and are subject to this fee as a percentage of the value of the transaction. A
proportion of the fee may be retained by Border Bank. The amount of this conversion
fee is subject to change from time to time and we will advise you in advance.

listData.name: Personal Loan
listData.description: Borrow for any worthwhile purpose from the latest in big ticket electronics, white goods and household items to holidays, cars, boats and bikes.

features.additionalInfo: Unlimited free additional repayments
No Monthly Account Keeping Fees
Only available on Variable

Your Border Bank Personal Loan may contribute to our Reduced Fees Program, helping to reduce (or eliminate) fees – save on ATM and EFTPOS transactions (as well as qualify for fee rebates), personal cheques and external electronic periodical payments.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when we send you a default notice under a loan contract when an arrears remains unremedied after we have sent you an arrears letter.

fees.name: Dishonoured Cheque fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when a cheque or other payment to your account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Personal Loan Establishment fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when your loan is funded

fees.name: PPSR
fees.additionalInfo:
Certain loans will require us to use the services of PPSR. If we do so, the following may be payable:
• PPSR Registration Fee
• PPSR Financier Interest Enquiry
• PPSR Variation of Interest

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalValue: $5 for Archive Retrieval and $1.50 per page.
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request an additional statement.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when you exceed your credit limit by $75 or more within a calendar month. Interest will also be charged on any amount overdrawn in excess of the approved credit limit at the then current annual percentage rate

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when we send you an arrears letter asking you to remedy an arrears under a loan contract.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalValue: Charged where the whole or any part of your loan repayment remains unpaid after 14 days past the due date. Applies to all Border Bank loans and continuing credit accounts.

Verified by Visa is a service designed to ensure you are protected while shopping online with your Visa card. As you make a purchase online, Border Bank assesses the risk of the transaction based on a number of factors. In some instances, you may be asked to confirm some personal details (date of birth, mother's maiden name, address details) so Border Bank can be sure the card isn't being used without your permission.
Pay with your Border Bank Visa Debit Cards using Apple Pay
You can pay bills via BPAY and check your account details or make transfers anytime or anywhere using our Redidial Telephone Banking service or online with Internet Banking – both services are free.
Can be used at over 29 million Visa outlets in over 250 countries around the world
Select the Contact Method that you would like to use for your PayID i.e. your mobile number or email address.
Our Debit Card is issued with the Visa PayWave ‘contactless’ payment feature. This allows you to pay for purchases under $100 without swiping, signing, or entering a PIN at participating merchants.
Pay with your Border Bank Visa Debit Cards using Samsung Pay

Our Visa Card provides access to the Visa Entertainment program. This gives you the opportunity to purchase unique deals including preferred seating at special events, discounts on retail as well as other exclusive offers

fees.name: Replacement Card fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable for any second or subsequent request for the replacement of a Visa Card

fees.name: Visa International Fees
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable if and when you use the Visa Card overseas and the transaction is in a
foreign currency. All overseas transactions are converted to Australian dollars
and are subject to this fee as a percentage of the value of the transaction. A
proportion of the fee may be retained by Border Bank. The amount of this conversion
fee is subject to change from time to time and we will advise you in advance.

fees.name: Bank@Post Cash Withdrawal fee
fees.additionalValue: Includes; cash withdrawals, declined Bank@Post transactions including incorrect PIN entered, insufficient funds and exceeding withdrawal limits

fees.name: Visa Credit Card Annual Fee
fees.additionalValue: Debited to your Visa Credit Card Account on the first statement of account after acceptance of the contract, and then annually in advance.

fees.name: Third Party Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Any costs charged to us from a third party will be passed on to you. Information on these costs is available on request.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable if and when we send you a default notice for an overdrawn account where an arrears remains unremedied after we have sent you an arrears letter.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalValue: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee per transaction

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalValue: $5.00 for Archive Retrieval and $1.50 per page.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when you exceed your credit limit by $75 or more within a calendar month. Interest will also be charged on any amount overdrawn in excess of the approved credit limit at the then current annual percentage rate.

fees.name: Visa Overseas Emergency Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when you request an emergency replacement Visa Card or emergency cash advance overseas.

fees.name: External Electronic Periodical Payments
fees.additionalValue: Per transaction that you request Border Bank staff to set up on your behalf.

fees.name: ATM Overseas withdrawal
fees.additionalValue: Visa Cash withdrawal at a merchant using the CR (Credit) facility, another financial institution, or an overseas ATM withdrawal, or any ATM withdrawal from an S14 Visa Credit Card.

fees.name: Dishonoured Cheque fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable if and when a cheque or other payment to your account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Dormant Accounts fee
fees.additionalValue: After 3 years an account is classed as dormant if no Member transactions occur. Interest, fees and government charges are not classed as transactions.

fees.name: Document Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalValue: Minimum $22.77 per hour retrieval fee and minimum $30.00 per hour administrative fee.

fees.name: Counter Cash withdrawal fee up to $24,999
Special Cheque clearance fee for Personal Accounts
Visa Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalValue: Visa Cash withdrawal at a merchant using the CR (Credit) facility, another financial institution, or an overseas ATM withdrawal, or any ATM withdrawal from an S14 Visa Credit Card.

detailData.name: Credit Card
detailData.description: A Low Rate and low Annual Fee Credit  card
